<title level="1" right="Hazard 6" pfs="">[False Door Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=174)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 59</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

A black-powder charge detonates as soon as the doorknob is turned, shattering the door into splinters.

---

**Stealth**
DC 28 (expert) to see the brick wall behind the edges of the door

**Disable**
DC 27 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (expert) to disable the doorknob trigger

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 24, **Fort** +17, **Ref** +11

**Hardness**
8

**HP**
50  (BT 25)

**Immunities**
critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Explosive Charge** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** The doorknob is turned; **Effect** The charge behind the door explodes, dealing 2d8+9 fire damage and 2d8+9 piercing damage to all creatures in a 10-foot cone blasting outward from the door (DC 27 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The sound of the explosion can be heard up to 50 feet away
